TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContractClassForAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Marks a class as containing contracts for the type specified.
Docs.remarks: Interfaces and abstract methods cannot have their contracts written directly in the code. The and may be used to specify another class that contains the contracts for an interface or abstract class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type typeContractsAreFor) cil managed

Docs.param: The type (interface or abstract class) for which these are the code contract specifications.
Docs.summary: Constructs a ContractClassForAttribute, specifying the type (interface or abstract class) for which these are the code contract specifications.
Get the type for which these are the code contract specifications.
Docs.value: The type for which these are the code contract specifications.
